name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Technical Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing SaaS solutions and high-performance applications, particularly within healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **C#**, with strong skills in SQL and APIs to create robust backend systems. Demonstrated expertise in managing version control using **Git** and overseeing the development lifecycle with tools like **JIRA**.

Hands-on experience in deploying scalable cloud infrastructures on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Knowledgeable in networking and security protocols, ensuring compliant and secure applications aligned with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Proven ability to implement and optimize CI/CD pipelines for efficient development workflows.

Exceptional analytical skills and adaptability, complemented by effective time management and customer-focused project delivery. A solid foundation in technical documentation enhances collaboration and knowledge sharing among teams.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **Python** and **JavaScript** to design and build **SaaS** full-stack platforms for healthcare and fintech, ensuring compliance with industry regulations (HIPAA, FHIR, GDPR, PCI DSS, SOX).
Developed user-friendly applications for iOS and Android using **Flutter** and **React Native**, integrating native modules and managing state with Redux to enhance secure, real-time user interactions for **9,000+** users.
Created comprehensive CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Fastlane** and **App Center** for mobile development, incorporating automated testing, release workflows, and crash analytics with **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry** for improved deployment efficiency.
Transformed legacy systems into modern microservices architectures employing **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and **AWS Lambda** for seamless, scalable deployments, achieving a **30%** reduction in system downtime.
Engineered and maintained robust data infrastructure using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **GraphQL**, enabling support for heavy data ingestion and real-time analytics for health and finance sectors.
Deployed **ML models** for risk scoring and fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow**, with real-time backend inference integrated into production systems, doubling processing speed.
Implemented **MLOps workflows** using **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Airflow**, overseeing model training, validation, and deployment across diverse environments, resulting in a **15%** increase in deployment efficiency.
Integrated AI-driven features in frontend applications, such as personalized dashboards and predictive alerts, powered by models hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**, enhancing user engagement by **25%**.
Built durable DevOps pipelines with **GitHub Actions**, **CircleCI**, and **Azure DevOps**, ensuring thorough test automation and security checks across multi-environment deployment workflows.
Developed advanced data visualization tools using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, facilitating real-time analysis of key performance indicators in finance and fraud detection.
Collaborated with ML teams to deploy NLP models (utilizing **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers**) for document parsing and anomaly detection, exposed through secured REST APIs, improving document processing time by **20%**.
Defined rigorous testing strategies across the stack using **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PyTest** to cover unit, integration, E2E, and contract-level tests, ensuring software reliability.
Enhanced search functionality with **Azure Cognitive Search** and **Elasticsearch**, optimizing query performance for structured and unstructured datasets, improving search response times by **40%**.

• Employed **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture utilizing **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
• Leveraged **JavaScript** frameworks such as **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Next.js** to build interactive front-end applications, creating sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels through **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**.
• Developed and delivered real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, boosting efficiency by **30%**.
• Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance processes, reducing latency by **25%**.
• Created ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources utilizing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, accommodating both batch and real-time processing, enhancing data processing speed by **40%**.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection leveraging **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, facilitating proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, improving detection rates by **15%**.
• Formulated ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification by integrating **MLflow** and **Airflow** into backend services, optimizing model inference and overall platform responsiveness.

- Developed and optimized scalable backend services for SaaS applications utilizing **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **JavaScript** (Node.js - NestJS, Express) ensuring robust performance and low latency across all deployments.
- Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to support various integrations and enhance system interoperability while ensuring secured data transactions and communication.
- Managed source control using **Git** for version control, facilitating seamless collaboration across cross-functional teams and improving overall project efficiency.
- Worked with cloud platforms like **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to design, deploy, and maintain cloud solutions for diverse SaaS offerings, ensuring high availability and cost-efficiency.
- Conducted technical documentation and project management ensuring clarity and alignment with stakeholder requirements using **JIRA** for effective tracking and issue resolution.
- Applied **SQL** databases alongside NoSQL solutions (MongoDB, PostgreSQL) for efficient data handling in high-traffic environments, enhancing database performance by up to **30%**.
- Ensured robust security measures through **role-based access control (RBAC)** and **OAuth 2.0** integration, maintaining compliance with **GDPR** standards and protecting sensitive data across the SaaS platform.
- Leveraged analytical skills to troubleshoot and devise innovative solutions to technical challenges, improving system uptime from **95%** to **99.9%**.
- Maintained strong customer focus by adapting solutions to meet user needs, demonstrating exceptional adaptability in dynamic project landscapes and tight timelines.
- Implemented effective time management strategies, prioritizing tasks to ensure successful project deliverables within proposed deadlines and requirements.
